_source.text: #152 AlexanderrOfAsura , Posted: Sep 04 2010 at 3:46 PM , Rating: Sub-Default, ( Expand Post ) Because if you want to get something to make Smn better, like increasing dmg and expanding enhancing/enfeebling while at the same time also lowering costs or perp, then smn ought to have something taken away from it.

text: ) **Because** if you want to get something to make Smn **better**, like increasing dmg and expanding enhancing
/enfeebling while at the same **time** also lowering costs or **perp**, then smn ought to have something taken away from it.
